title: QUICKFIRE Academy LF Players
body:
We are looking for someone who can Top, preferably in Silver-Gold. Who will want to play in Team.

Mid Adc Jungle Support have already been filled.

Must be able to play throughout the week. We play from 4pm-10pm Weekdays and on weekends are around 12pm-10pm. This is a serious team that wants to learn to progress with others in team scenarios 

TEAMSPEAK is a must !

Note (Not everyone will be online but most days. So Don't stress if you can't come online)

If you would like to join us, add me on the client.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: I sent you a message ig
